entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Point Lepreau 4:00 PM AST Sunday 01 January 2023

Humidity: 86 %

Wind: NNW 25 km/h gust 41 km/h

entry.title: Sunday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: A few rain showers ending this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 01 January 2023
